page.title: 04Leisure in North Hastings.
page.content: Next to Christ Church there is a community centre where there are lots of leisure activities like cubs,scouts,guides and brownies. Uniforms are worn and useful skills are practised and tested.Cubs and Brownies are for 7 to 11 year olds Scouts and Guides are for 11 to 15 year olds.There are two football pitches at Pilot Field.You can watch a game of football there.It costs Â£1.00 for adults and 50p for children.At the Broomgrove Centre,people between the ages of 18 and 60 can play Bingo.There used to be a youth club and disco there,but these had to close due to lack of adult support and some trouble at the disco.At Bucks Hole Reservoir you can fish for pike.At home, computers,games and video films are very popular forms of leisure activity.
